signUpPage.enterEmail: Enter your email below to create your account

profilePage.serverSideData: The following data are retrieve server-side.

profileDetails.updateAccountDescription: You can update your account details here.
profileDetails.loggedDevicesDescription: Manage your logged in devices here.

deleteLoggedDevice.description: This action will disconnect the device connected to this session.

auth.clickingAggreement: By clicking continue, you agree to our

couldNotMessage: Could not {action} {subject}. Please try again later.
needSavePopup: Be careful, there are still unsaved changes!

username.min3: Username must be at least 3 characters long.
username.max30: Username must be at most 30 characters long.

password.regex: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character
password.min8: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
password.max25: Password must be at most 25 characters long.

errors.unknownError: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again later.
errors.wrongProvider: You already have an account with a different provider. Please sign in with it.
errors.unauthorized: You have been logged out. Please sign in again.
errors.cannotDeleteAdmin: You cannot delete the admin account.
errors.accountAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists.
errors.userDoesNotHaveAPassword: This user does not have a password.
errors.pleaseTryAgainInFewMinutes: Please try again in a few minutes.
errors.emailAlreadySentPleaseTryAgainInFewMinut: An email has already been sent. Please try again in a few minutes.
errors.cannotResetAdminPasswordInDemoMode: You cannot reset the admin password in demo mode.
errors.unavailableWithOAuth: This feature is not available with OAuth providers.

deleteAccountConfirmationDescription: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.
forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email below to reset your password.
forgotPasswordSuccessDescription: An email has been sent to you. Please follow the instructions in the email to reset your password.
timeUntilYouCanRequestAnotherEmail: Time until you can request another email
emailVerificationSentDescription: An email has been sent to you. Please follow the instructions in the email to verify your email address.
uploadDescription: Click or drag a file here to upload it.
